property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Put a card from your deck into your mana zone, and then put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Return a creature from your mana zone to your hand. ■ After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone tapped instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
